body_html: The current implementation crashes the Python kernel when given an output shape with a -1 in the first dimension. It would be helpful to throw a Python error and document this limitation, as ops produced by similar functions (eg conv2d) handle the scenario just fine.
body_text: The current implementation crashes the Python kernel when given an output shape with a -1 in the first dimension. It would be helpful to throw a Python error and document this limitation, as ops produced by similar functions (eg conv2d) handle the scenario just fine.
body: The current implementation crashes the Python kernel when given an output shape with a -1 in the first dimension. It would be helpful to throw a Python error and document this limitation, as ops produced by similar functions (eg conv2d) handle the scenario just fine.
